attributes.action: To legalise the use of medicinal marijuana.
attributes.additional_details: The legalisation of medicinal marijuana has helped many patients, with a wide range of symptoms in places such as Colorado and California in the US. The legal use of marijuana will help both patients and the economy alike. It is estimated that there is over 2.6 million medicinal marijuana users in the US alone, which amounted to $5.4 billion in 2015, from $4.6 billion in 2014.
attributes.background: Legalising the use of medicinal marijuana to ease symptoms of many conditions from nauseousness, insomnia, anxiety, cystic fibrosis, pain relief and relief for those going through cancer treatments such as chemotherapy.
